Text-Analysis

text_analysis.word_cloud(text_data)[source]
text_analysis.word_frequency_bar_chart(text, include_others=True, n=10)[source]

Creates a bar chart of word frequency distribution from the input text.

text_analysis.word_frequency_pie_chart(text, include_others=True, n=10)[source]

Creates a pie chart of word frequency distribution from the input text.
